price: ធ្វើដូច្នោះពួកគេ(យ៉ាក់ជូចនិងម៉ាក់ជូច)មិនអាចឡើងឆ្លង ជញ្ជាំងដែក និងមិនអាចចោះទំលុះវាបានឡើយ។
arabic: فَمَا ٱسۡطَٰعُوٓاْ أَن يَظۡهَرُوهُ وَمَا ٱسۡتَطَٰعُواْ لَهُۥ نَقۡبٗا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: famā is'ṭāʿū an yaẓharūhu wamā is'taṭāʿū lahu naqban
